title: Câmbio
heading: Storylines of Value
subHeading: An origin myth about changing the heart of money
introduction:
Celo is a foundational technology focused on building a financial system that creates the conditions of prosperity — for everyone.

cLabs is a team shaping Celo. In doing purposeful, challenging work, we believe that having a shared vision throughout the process is important to cLabs.

In changing today’s story, we actualize that vision by retelling stories from the past — where technology and forms of value were as fair and functional as inspiring.

There are some important stories that reflect lessons about the work we do together with our communities. One of these stories that continues to enliven us comes from Curitiba’s bus token.
mythTitle: An example of hope for creative cooperation
mythSubTitle: The Brazilian city of Curitiba mirrored many other impoverished parts of the globe.
